title: Daemon Sync Server LXC
textContent:
Daemon Sync Server LXC 
                Sync files from app to server, share photos & videos, back up your data and stay secure inside
                    local
                    network.
                To create a new Proxmox VE Daemon Sync Server LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE
                        Shell.
                
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/daemonsync.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 512MiB RAM - 8GB Storage - 1vCPU ⚡
                Daemon Sync Server Interface: IP:8084
                Search: DAEMON Sync in your favorite app store
outerHTML:
Daemon Sync Server LXC

Sync files from app to server, share photos & videos, back up your data and stay secure inside local network.

To create a new Proxmox VE Daemon Sync Server LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell. 

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/daemonsync.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 512MiB RAM - 8GB Storage - 1vCPU ⚡

Daemon Sync Server Interface: IP:8084

Search: DAEMON Sync in your favorite app store
